dt: {bc}a time characterized by a particular circumstance or feature
{bc}a suitable or natural time or occasion

dt.t: when my {wi}season{/wi} comes to sit on David's throne
sent home again to her father for a {wi}season{/wi}

dt: {bc}a period of the year characterized by or associated with a particular activity or phenomenon
{bc}a period associated with some phase or activity of agriculture (such as growth or harvesting)
{bc}a period in which an animal engages in some activity (such as migrating or mating)
{bc}the period normally characterized by a particular kind of weather
{bc}a period marked by special activity especially in some field
{bc}a period in which a place is most frequented
{bc}one of the four quarters into which the year is commonly divided
{bc}a period of time when a series of new television shows, plays, etc., are being shown or performed
{bc}the schedule of official games played or to be played by a sports team during a playing season
{bc}at the stage of greatest fitness (as for eating)
{bc}legally available to be hunted or caught

et: Middle English {it}sesoun{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}seison{/it} natural season, appropriate time, from Latin {it}sation-, satio{/it} action of sowing, from {it}serere{/it} to sow {ma}{mat|sow|}{/ma}
shortdef: a time characterized by a particular circumstance or feature
a suitable or natural time or occasion
an indefinite period of time : while

dt: {bc}to give (food) more flavor or zest by adding {a_link|seasoning} or savory ingredients
{bc}to give a distinctive quality to as if by seasoning
{bc}to treat (something, such as wood or a skillet) so as to prepare for use

et: Middle English {it}sesounen{/it}, back-formation from {it}sesounde{/it} flavored, from Anglo-French {it}seisoné{/it} brought to a desired state, from {it}seison{/it}
shortdef: to give (food) more flavor or zest by adding seasoning or savory ingredients
to give a distinctive quality to as if by seasoning; especially : to make more agreeable

dt: {bc}a ticket (as to all of a club's home games or for specified daily transportation) valid during a specified time

shortdef: a ticket (as to all of a club's home games or for specified daily transportation) valid during a specified time

dt: used in writing as a greeting in the time of year when Christmas and several other holidays happen near each other

shortdef: —used in writing as a greeting in the time of year when Christmas and several other holidays happen near each other

dt: {bc}to add as much salt or pepper or as much of a spice or herb as one likes so something tastes good

shortdef: to add as much salt or pepper or as much of a spice or herb as one likes so something tastes good

dt: {bc}a time of suspended or reduced activity
{bc}the time during which an athlete is not training or competing

shortdef: a time of suspended or reduced activity; especially : the time during which an athlete is not training or competing

dt: {bc}a period when it is legal to kill or catch game or fish protected at other times by law
{bc}a time during which someone or something is the object of sustained attack or criticism

shortdef: a period when it is legal to kill or catch game or fish protected at other times by law
a time during which someone or something is the object of sustained attack or criticism

dt: {bc}a period (such as late summer) when the mass media often focus on trivial or frivolous matters for lack of major news stories
{bc}a period marked by frivolous, outlandish, or illogical activity or behavior

shortdef: a period (such as late summer) when the mass media often focus on trivial or frivolous matters for lack of major news stories
a period marked by frivolous, outlandish, or illogical activity or behavior

dt: {bc}the period of time when animals are mating

shortdef: the period of time when animals are mating

dt: {bc}the time of year when people are getting ready for Christmas

shortdef: the time of year when people are getting ready for Christmas
